####  Description __

## Custom 50th Wedding Anniversary Engraved Gold Sundial Gift for: Parents,
Grandparents, Couples, For Him or Her

This is the most precise and customizable sundial available in the world.
Simply provide us with the address where the sundial will be used and we will
create a custom, elegant sundial engineered exactly for your location, and
your location only! Add a custom saying and your Apollo sundial will truly be
one of a kind. Each Apollo sundial is custom made to your location on the
globe. A computer-driven CNC machine etches the lines into the metal. The
result is a modern perfection of an ancient timepiece. The sundial will last
for generations, rivalling that of a precision timepiece.  

### Why is every Apollo Sundial made to your location?  

We strive for precision and elegant design. Just like every single place on
the planet is different, so is every one of our sundials. A sundial is made of
two components, the dial and the pointer (gnomon). The pointer casts a shadow
on the dial, allowing you to tell the time. However, the sun's rays hit the
Earth at different angles depending on where you live! Whether you live in
Florida where the sun is high in the sky or further north in New York where
the sun is lower, a different size pointer and dial design is required. Our
pictures above illustrate the visibly different angles that are required.

### Description:

Circular sundial, made of aluminum and stainless steel, custom made for your
location, includes custom engraving at no extra cost.



### Sizes:

6in x 6in OR  
8in x 8in OR  
12in x 12in OR  
16in x16in  

### Message Engraving Character Maximums (spaces included as characters):

6x6: 20 characters Max.  
8x8: 40 characters Max.  
12x12 + 16x16: 60 characters Max.

  
A Gift that Stands the Test of Time: This is the perfect gift for a loved one
or just for yourself. The most customizable and unique gift for your garden.
The precise, minimalistic and timeless design of Apollo sundials sets it
apart.

No matter the occasion or your location, we will handcraft the perfect sundial
just for you. When you commission the creation of your very own sundial, you
will be the only person in the world who has one just like it.

### **_The most amazing gift idea of all time is here. Don’t miss it!_**

####  Shipping & Delivery __

All of our products are handmade. The processing will take 10 days, shipping
time for in-stock-products will take 1-2 weeks. For customized products,
please keep in mind that our artists will need another 7 days to craft the
items according to your needs. And for products listed as "Preorder," please
allow 4-6 weeks for delivery.

Our team will continuously update your tracking status and send you a
notification email. Please contact us at  **support@mygiftstories.com**  if
you have any questions.  
  
If your product is damaged or defected, please kindly email us with the
subject line “Return: Damage or Defected item with your order #” along with a
photograph so we can immediately look into sending you a new one.  
  
See more about our return policy here: Mygiftstories's Return & Refund policy.
